summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period of November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest earned on the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of November 30, 2013, was $166,169.42.
The document details an incoming money transfer of $166,139.83 on November 5, 2013.
An interest payment of $29.59 was credited to the account on November 30, 2013.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $93.00.
The document includes instructions for disputing errors on the account statement.
